attacks.name: Green Heal
attacks.effect: Remove 4 damage counters from each of your Pokémon that has Grass Energy attached. If that Pokémon has less than 4 damage counters, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Poison Ring
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.effect: Sceptile ex can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.
